meta.description: Determine the maximum amount of data that can be transferred from Station 0 to Station 6 per hour, without exceeding the capacities of the telecommunication lines.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of data transfer between stations in terabytes.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Amount of data flow between stations in terabytes.

objective.name: max_data_transfer
objective.description: Maximize the data transfer from Station 0 to Station 6.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_1
constraints.description: Flow from Station 0 to Station 1 does not exceed capacity.
